Literature.Title: D-enantiomeric peptides that eradicate wild-type and multi-drug resistant biofilms and protect against lethal Pseudomonas aeruginosa infections.
Literature.Author: César de la Fuente-Núñez, Reffuveille F, Mansour SC, Reckseidler-Zenteno SL, Hernández D, Brackman G, Coenye T, Hancock RE

Literature.Title: DJK-5, an anti-biofilm peptide, increases Staphylococcus aureus sensitivity to colistin killing in co-biofilms with Pseudomonas aeruginosa
Literature.Author: Wardell SJT, Yung DBY, Gupta A, Bostina M, Overhage J, Hancock REW, Pletzer D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157(MIC=1.6µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17987(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia 4813(MIC=>256µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 218R(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPLN649(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1549216(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8 - =>16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LES400(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C587(MIC=3.2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LESB58(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LESB58(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
